input_text:
Job Title: Leasing Consultant

Location: San Mateo, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Sales

Description:
Job Description

Our Leasing Teammates are top sales performers, providing exceptional customer experiences and driving sales through the execution of AIR's sales process.

AIR Communities offers a unique opportunity for our Leasing Consultants to enjoy a Winter Break after peak season has ended. You will keep all your benefits (including your 25% rent discount) during this unpaid break while you refresh & recharge during the holiday season! During your time off from late October/November through January, the opportunities are endless; take vacations, follow passions, spend time with loved ones, volunteer, take a seasonal holiday job! Then, come February, be ready to return and do it all again!

You will work at Laurel Crossing Apartment Homes, our apartment community located in San Mateo, CA! Check it out here: https://www.laurelcrossingapthomes.com/

Responsibilities

Manage consumer life cycle, from acquisition to retention.Lease apartments and assist in community marketing.Follow sales process for on-site visits, including scheduling, presenting, giving tours, and following up.Provide leasing support to all communities in AIR portfolio.Consistently reach or exceed monthly leasing goals.

Qualifications

1+ year sales and customer service experience in a fast-paced environment (e.g., property management, hospitality, retail, or restaurant).Familiar with goal setting/achievement and following a sales process.Exceptional customer service skills to address current/future resident needs.Reliable transportation.Flexible schedule availability, including evenings/weekends.Proficient in reading, writing, and speaking English.

The Most Successful AIR Leasing Teammates Are

Sales InnovatorsCustomer-FocusedPassionateOrganizedConcise CommunicatorsMotivatedSolution-Focused

#PIQ

Additional Information

AIR Offers Attractive Total Compensation Packages Designed To Recognize And Reward Performance At The Individual, Team, And Company Levels. We Start With a Competitive Base Salary And Add Bonus Opportunities And Benefit Choices Topped Off With

Expected base pay rate of $18 - $20 per hour + lucrative commissions.(Annual income anticipated between $68,000 - $85,000+) You will be provided a pay rate that is in line with your skills and experience as they relate to the requirements of the job.25% Rent Discount available!Opportunity for extended time-off with benefits during slower parts of the year.Medical, dental, vision, and life insurance options, HSA/FSA plans, short and long-term disability paid by the company.401(K), Employee Stock Purchase Plans, tuition assistance program, commuter benefits, and pet insurance.Paid time off including vacation, holidays, and sick time.Up to 100% reimbursement for job-related certifications and licenses.Paid parental leave of up to 16 weeks.Consumer discounts on various products and services.15 hours of paid time annually for community service.Opportunities for professional development and career growth.

Candidates extended an offer will be required to undergo a four-panel drug screening that excludes marijuana testing.

PandoLogic. Keywords: Real Estate Agent - Apartments, Location: San Mateo, CA - 94403

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.summary: Top sales performer providing exceptional customer experiences and driving sales through the execution of AIR's sales process.

Lease apartments and assist in community marketing.
Follow sales process for on-site visits, including scheduling, presenting, giving tours, and following up.
Provide leasing support to all communities in AIR portfolio.
Consistently reach or exceed monthly leasing goals.
benefits: Medical, dental, vision, and life insurance options
Short and long-term disability paid by the company
Paid time off including vacation, holidays, and sick time
Up to 100% reimbursement for job-related certifications and licenses
Paid parental leave of up to 16 weeks
Consumer discounts on various products and services
15 hours of paid time annually for community service
Opportunities for professional development and career growth
output_json.company_information: AIR Communities offers a unique opportunity for its Leasing Consultants to enjoy a Winter Break after peak season has ended.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Candidates extended an offer will be required to undergo a four-panel drug screening that excludes marijuana testing.

other.content: Competitive base salary, bonus opportunities, benefit choices, medical, dental, vision, and life insurance options, HSA/FSA plans, short and long-term disability paid by the company, 401(K), Employee Stock Purchase Plans, tuition assistance program, commuter benefits, pet insurance, paid time off, job-related certifications and licenses reimbursement, paid parental leave, consumer discounts, community service opportunities, and professional development.
